title: Add current principal as admin

requirements.text: Add the currently logged-in user's principal ID to the list of admin principals in the backend

quotes: add my. current principal as an admin

acceptanceCriteria: The backend maintains a stable collection of admin principal IDs
When the user logs in with their Internet Identity, their principal is included in the admin list
The isAdmin query returns true for the user's principal
The admin status persists across canister upgrades

requirements.text: Verify that the Admin Panel section becomes visible in the Settings screen after the user's principal is added as admin
acceptanceCriteria: The useAdminRole hook returns isAdmin: true for the user
The Admin Panel section with 'Manage Venues' button appears in SettingsAboutScreen
The admin check completes without errors

constraints: Use the existing isAdmin query pattern from the backend
Preserve existing admin functionality and access control logic
Do not modify the Internet Identity authentication flow
nonGoals: Creating a UI for adding multiple admins
